Meteorological symbols
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

BARC has a host of specfic meteorological symbols availble. These symbols are displayed in groups of similar weather features or characteristics. To select a group of symbols use the dropdown toolbar to select the group and then select the specfic symbol you want to use. More information about what the symbol represents is displayed when you hover over the icons. Group 0 - 9 reference the well established WMO present weather symbols.




+---------------------------------------------+----+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ..   image:: /images/pw_symbols/pw-000.png  |    |  Cloud development not observed or not   observable                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|         :width: 36px                        |    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|         :height: 36px                       |    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|         :alt: wibble                        | 0  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+---------------------------------------------+----+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ..   image:: /images/pw_symbols/pw-001.png  |    |  Cloud generally dissolving or   becoming less developed                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|         :width: 36px                        |    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|         :height: 36px                       |    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|         :alt: wibble                        | 1  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+---------------------------------------------+----+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ..   image:: /images/pw_symbols/pw-002.png  |    |  State of sky on the whole   unchanged                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|         :width: 36px                        |    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|         :height: 36px                       |    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

| ..   image:: /images/pw_symbols/pw-007.png  |    |  Dust or sand raised by wind at or   near the station at the time of observation, but not well developed dust   whirl(s) or sand whirl(s), and no duststorm or sandstorm seen; or, in the   case of ships, blowing spray at the station                                      |
